product_name: Salomon Park Hydro Handset - 17 fl. oz.
long_description: Ready for your run, the 17 fl. oz. Salomon Park Hydro Handset fits comfortably in your hand with a stretch carrying system and 500ml flask that compresses as you drink. Soft flask with Blaster valve is free of BPA and phthalates. The Salomon Park Hydro Handset features reflective accents and a small external pocket that fits a car key, mobile phone, MP3 player or gels.
short_description: Ready for your run, the 17 fl. oz. Salomon Park Hydro Handset fits comfortably in your hand with a stretch carrying system and 500ml flask that compresses as you drink.
